item.description: Quick review of the Evilginx Mastery course and helpful tips to use while taking it.

item.description: Review of HackTheBox Academy’s Certified Bug Bounty Hunter certification, the reasons why I chose this certification, review of the course material, and how the exam is.

item.title: Quick Note on Discord OSINT

item.title: How to Create Your Own Website
item.description: I will be going over why I decided to create my own website and how you can do the same using Hugo and the Blowfish theme.
